{"id":1734135119,"question_id":3952,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1755109980,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"21 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1734135119/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trionic Array I","memory":"28.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> arr;\n    \n    bool check_inc(int l, int r) {\n        bool ok = true;\n        for (int i=l+1; i<=r; i++) {\n            ok &= (arr[i] > arr[i-1]);\n        }\n        return ok;\n    }\n    bool check_dec(int l, int r) {\n        bool ok = true;\n        for (int i=l+1; i<=r; i++) {\n            ok &= (arr[i] < arr[i-1]);\n        }\n        return ok;\n    }\n    \n    bool isTrionic(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        arr = nums;\n        bool ok = false;\n        for (int l=1; l<N-1; l++) {\n            for (int r=l+1; r<N-1; r++) {\n                ok |= check_inc(0, l) && check_dec(l, r) && check_inc(r, N-1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ok;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trionic-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1172}
